name: A journal from Gustave's apprentices

name: Old Key
info: Location: Obtained from Colette in the blue tent at the Gommage in exchange for one token. Can later be used to open an old gate to retrieve the Fracture Survivor journal entry in Old Lumiere

name: Wooden Stick
info: Location: Can be bought from the Gestral in the marketplace of the Gestral Village for x1,000 Chroma

name: Mushroom
info: Location: Found within Esquie's Nest - to the left of the Mime, in the water near the glowing mushrooms. Bring this item to Karatom in the Gestral Village for the Pure Outfit

name: Wood Boards
info:
Location: Found within the Esoteric Ruins - After passing through the maze, you will find it on the ruins of the builds right in front of you. You can deliver this item to the spirit you see at the entrance.

Rewards:

  • Protecting Heal

name: Eternal Ice
info: Location: Drops from defeating Gargant. Give this item to the Grandis "Eternal Ice" Merchant to unlock his inventory

name: Tisseur
info:
Location: Found within the Sirene - Although it is a boss that is connected to the story, it is an optional boss. It is entirely up to the player to defeat it or not.

  • Anti-Charm (Pictos)
  • Resplendent Chroma Catalyst x3

name: Chroma Elixir Shard

name: Energy Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the Spring Meadows - after climbing the rope in the building, upon looking out to the grassy ledge below, head right down the ramp in the building to find the shard at the bottom under the ramp

name: Healing Tint Shard
info:
Location: Found within Spring Meadows:

  • First speak with Jar, who can be found sitting near the Abandoned Expeditioner Camp rest point. He requests your help
  • Retrieve the Resin and head back to speak with Jar again
  • When Jar asks you for light, shoot the lantern on top of his staff, then speak with him again for your reward

name: Revive Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the Flying Waters - South Entrance - head up and to the right from the Coral Cave rest point and drop into the red hole in the ground. Open the Paint Cage in the area below to obtain the tint

name: Energy Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the Flying Waters - South Entrance - in the street near the stall just below the Lumerian Streets rest point

name: Healing Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the Ancient Sanctuary - South Entrance - in the red grass at the feet of a statue, just past the Giant Bell Alley rest point

name: Energy Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the The Manor - You can reach it by jumping over the platforms. Among the books.

name: Chroma Elixir Shard
info: Location: Found within the Stone Wave Cliffs Cave - Inside the Paint Cage. After crossing the bridge formed by a stone column, go through the hole between the rocks on the right and go up.

name: Healing Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the Forgotten Battlefield - South Entrance - After passing through the big gate, follow the path to the left. Among the ruins.

name: Energy Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the Forgotten Battlefield - South Entrance - Follow the path to the right after passing through the big gate. Cross the wooden bridge on the left and go down over the shipwreck. It's behind the wooden boxes on the right.

name: Healing Tint Shard
info: Location: Found within the Visages - Path of Joy

name: Sekarum (Maelle)
info: Location: Can be bought from Eesda after winning a fight against them. Find them in the hut just beyond the market inside the Gestral Village

name: Medalum (Maelle)
info: Location: Rewarded from the final Gestral fight in the Arena during the story quest - you must win the fight with Maelle to receive the weapon

name: Chation (Sciel)
info: Location: Found within the Stone Wave Cliffs - South Entrance - Follow the main path to the destroyed airship. Go through the tunnel that was left by the remnants of the airship, then cross the platform to reach the other side. Stay on this path until you encounter a duo of a Greatsword Cultist and Reaper Cultist near the bridge. Defeat them so that it can drop the weapon.

name: Choralim (Lune)
info: Location: Found within the Stone Wave Cliffs - South Entrance - at the top of the ruined building

info: Location: Found within Stone Wave Cliffs - South Entrance - Shoot all the locks of the Paint Cage located in the farm to obtain the Duenum.
